text: Fox Sports 2 is an American sports-oriented pay television channel. It is owned by the Fox Sports Media Group, a unit of Fox Corporation. It was founded as Fuel TV on July 1, 2003. It is based at the Fox Sports division's headquarters on the Fox Studio Lot in the Century City section of Los Angeles, California. Category:American television channels Category:2003 establishments in the United States
title: Fox Sports 2
